title: What are the best K-pop spring songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you don’t mind, I’m going to nonchalantly blur the line between mainstream and independent music scenes, in order to provide more spring and flower-related lyrical themes in a list of K-pop songs about spring. Enjoy! Here in Korea, #1 on peoples lists by far would be 벚꽃엔딩 by BUSKER BUSKER  꽃송이가 by BUSKER BUSKER  비밀의 화원 by IU  같은 말 by Vanilla Acoustic  나만, 봄 by BOL4  Hawaiian Couple by Humming Urban Stereo (이진화 R.I.P.)  봄이 조냐? by 10cm  말하고 싶은 게 있어 by Lalasweet  The Spring by 정은지 (A-Pink) and multi-instrumentalist extraordinaire 하림  좋아해 by FROMM  다녀온 이야기 by 소규모 아카시아 밴드  꽃길만 걷게 해줄게 by DAYBREAK  아리따운 by Monni(몽니)  PERFECT DAY by 소란  Strangely enough, one of the only songs I’ve penned that still gets loads of airplay every spring here in Korea might be worth including in the list. Maybe ;) 소풍 (Picnic) by Dorothy in Wonderland
